# Xarticle

> Xarticle is an AI-powered content curation platform that discovers, organizes, and summarizes high-quality long-form articles from X (formerly Twitter). The platform uses AI to generate bilingual summaries (English and Chinese) for articles shared by thought leaders, VCs, founders, and researchers in tech, business, crypto, and culture.

## Key Information

- **Content Source**: Monitors thousands of X accounts for long-form article shares
- **AI Summaries**: Automatic bilingual summaries using OpenAI and Google Generative AI
- **Database**: PostgreSQL via Supabase for article storage and user authentication
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Deployment**: Vercel with edge regions (Singapore, Hong Kong, San Francisco)
- **Update Frequency**: New articles arrive every 15-20 minutes via automated cron jobs
- **Revalidation**: ISR with 5-minute revalidation for article pages

## API Endpoints

- [Articles API](https://www.xarticle.news/api/articles): List and filter all curated articles
- [Article by Author](https://www.xarticle.news/api/author/[handle]): Get articles by specific X author
- [Bookmarks API](https://www.xarticle.news/api/bookmarks): User bookmark management (requires auth)
- [Categories API](https://www.xarticle.news/api/categories): Available content categories
- [Timeline Fetch](https://www.xarticle.news/api/fetch-timeline): Fetch latest articles from followed X accounts
- [Health Check](https://www.xarticle.news/api/health): System status endpoint
- [RSS Feed](https://www.xarticle.news/rss.xml): Full RSS feed of all articles

## Core Pages

- [Trending](https://www.xarticle.news/trending): Main feed of all curated articles with search and filtering

## Data Schema

Articles contain the following fields:
- `id`: Unique identifier
- `title`, `title_english`: Article titles (original and English)
- `slug`: URL-friendly identifier
- `image`: Article thumbnail image URL
- `author_name`, `author_handle`, `author_avatar`: Author information
- `article_published_at`: Original publication date
- `tweet_views`, `tweet_replies`, `tweet_likes`: Engagement metrics
- `article_url`: Source article URL
- `language`: Content language (en/zh)
- `summary_english`, `summary_chinese`: AI-generated summaries
- `tags`: Content categories
